Text:
Well this baby is real and Nice quality.
Wish I could say more about the content, but there is potential.
Thanks corretorrents
Wow. I have to say it didn't take the media long to start advertising availability of these pilots, makes me wonder if they were purposely leaked.

Looks like this could be a good series.
The physics is right unlike Terminator 3
A lot of the pilots have been released on DVDs that you can rent at Blockbuster or something.  My sister was talking about it.

I love all the terminator movies. This is a welcome addition long overdue. Kudos to the producers and to everyone who worked hard on making this a reality. Good luck with the rest of the series, we look forward to many more awesome episodes. 

-Sincerely,
Every geek ever

T2 + Dawson's Creek.

That's the way the trailer looks, anyway.   But I'm actually rooting for it to not suck--against my better judgment.
